explanations.machine learning: The paper uses self-organizing maps (SOM) and decision trees, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.unsupervised learning: Self-organizing maps (SOM) are a type of unsupervised learning algorithm used for clustering.
explanations.decision tree: The paper explicitly mentions using a decision tree model to extract useful rules from clusters.
explanations.clustering: The paper uses SOM to group data into clusters, which is a clustering technique.
explanations.neural network: Self-organizing maps (SOM) are a type of artificial neural network.
